metadata.title: CVE-2015-3113 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.296 and 14.xthrough 18.x before 18.0.0.194 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.468on Linux allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecifiedvectors, as exploited in the wild in June 2015.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3113` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.468ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.468ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.468ubuntu0.14.04.1').
